thread.title: Khloe Kardashian's ex James Harden brands their relationship the "worst" period of his life
thread.title_full: Khloe Kardashian's ex James Harden brands their relationship the "worst" period of his life

author: Zoe Shenton
title: Khloe Kardashian's ex James Harden brands their relationship the "worst" period of his life
text:
Khloe Kardashian's ex James Harden brands their relationship the "worst" period of his life The NBA star says he hated the unwanted attention when they dated Share James Harden on his relationship with Khloe Kardashian (Photo: Getty/Splash) Share Get celebs   Thank you for subscribing! Could not subscribe, try again later Invalid Email 
Khloe Kardashian's ex James Harden has slammed their relationship, saing he "didn't get anything" out of it. 
The NBA star dated the Keeping Up With the Kardashians beauty for eight months in 2015 - a year he's now branded the "worst" period of his life - but has admitted he hated the unwanted attention he attracted because he was dating the reality TV star. 
Without naming the reality star, he said: "I didn't like all the attention. I feel like it was for no reason. I wasn't getting anything out of it except my name out there and my face out there, and I don't need that. It wasn't uncomfortable, but it wasn't me." Khloe and Kourtney (Photo: Splash News) The pair dated for eight months (Photo: Splash) James says he hated the unwanted attention (Photo: Splash) 
James added to Sports Illustrated magazine : "I don't need pictures of myself when I'm driving my car. Who cares? What shoes am I wearing? Who cares? Where am I eating? Who cares? It was unnecessary stuff that I think trickled down to my teammates. I had to eliminate that." 
The couple split up in early 2016 because the 27-year-old sportsman - who was also plagued with injury and his team the Houston Rockets were on a losing streak while he was dating Khloe - wanted to focus 100 per cent on his game. 
He added to the publication: "I'm not worried about anything but hooping and that may be why I'm having this kind of success. I like knowing I'm not going to see myself [on the cover of tabloid magazines]. It feels good." Read More When does Keeping Up With The Kardashians return for season 13, what happens and how can I watch in the UK? Khloe is now in a happy relationship with Tristan (Photo: KhloeKardashian/Instagram) 
While James is now devoted wholeheartedly to basketball, Khloe has since moved on and is in a relationship with Cleveland Cavaliers player Tristan Thompson, 25. 
And it looks like things are getting pretty serious between the pair as the 32-year-old reality TV star - whose divorce from Lamar Odom was finalised in December after she first filed the papers in 2013 - can see herself settling down with Tristan in the future. 
She said recently: "I'm in a really good space right now in my life. It's really good. I feel really happy and secure and I'm just in a really positive, healthy relationship." Video Loading Click to play Tap to play The video will start in 8 Cancel Play now
